concept.title: Users and Roles
concept.shortdesc: The includes a default administrator login. You can create additional users for increased security.

conbody.p: usersrolesrolesfor usersThe provides several roles that define the tasks that a user can perform. When you configure a user, assign each user one or more roles. Users can perform any task that their roles allow.

The provides the following roles:
admin Allows you to perform any task within the . As an admin, you can configure pipelines and alerts, start and stop pipelines, view snapshots, and start or stop the .
manager Allows you to manage pipelines. As a manager, you can start and stop pipelines, monitor pipelines, configure and reset alerts, and view snapshots. You cannot configure pipelines or perform data preview.
creator Allows you to configure pipelines. As a creator, you can configure pipelines and alerts, perform data preview, and monitor the pipeline. You cannot view snapshots or reset alerts.
guest Allows read-only access to areas of the . As a guest, you can view pipeline and alert configuration, view general monitoring and log information. You cannot view data preview or snapshots, or configure pipelines or alerts.
